experience: You and Libby Gill both know Steve Gershik, Brian Bowman, and 17 others
Libby Gill can introduce you to 8 people at Oracle
Every team has its own dynamic. Which are you?
We talk about connection. This article gives you the data and how-to!
CEO & Founder, Leadership Expert, Executive Coach & Consultant

Libby Gill is the former head of communications and public relations for Sony, Universal, and Turner Broadcasting.  She is the founder and CEO of executive coaching and consulting firm Libby Gill & Company. An international speaker, bestselling author, and former Dallas Morning News columnist,  she has shared her success strategies on CNN, NPR, the Today Show, and in BusinessWeek, Time, The New York Times, Wall Street Journal, and more.Libby helps established and emerging leaders at companies including Avery Dennison, Cisco, Disney-ABC, GoDaddy, Intel, Kellogg’s, Microsoft,  Oracle, PayPal, Royal Caribbean, Safeway, Warner Bros., Wells Fargo, inspire purpose and drive performance. With her vast expertise in communication and brand strategy, she also helps entrepreneurs brand and build their businesses.Please visit http://www.LibbyGill.com for more information about  coaching and consulting services.For information about women's leadership presentations and coaching, please visit http://libbygill.com/womens-events.
Branding & Production Consultant, VP Development & Programming

When Universal spun off its domestic television division, Libby took on a new role in reality television development and programming for Studios USA. Eventually becoming an independent consultant, Libby began coaching individuals and organizations to create compelling brands with lasting appeal.
SVP of Corporate Communications and Media Relations

Head of corporate communications and media relations, Libby served as spokesperson and PR chief for Universal Studio's worldwide TV group, reporting to the chairman during a pivotal time in the company's history. A strategic communications leader, Libby was key to shaping internal and external communications for the studio as well as developing the next level of leaders for the organization.

Libby was recruited by Turner Broadcasting Company to establish a West Coast communications and public relations office, overseeing campaigns for TBS, TNT, TCM, and Cartoon Network, working alongside a global team. Recognized as a skilled communications strategist and leadership expert, Libby built a team of dedicated professionals.

Libby started her corporate entertainment career as a PR assistant at Norman Lear's Embassy Communications which was acquired by Sony. Within five years, Libby had become VP and department head for publicity, advertising, and promotion for five divisions within Sony's Worldwide Television group, including Columbia Pictures Television and TriStar Television. In that capacity, she oversaw campaigns for such iconic hits as Married...With Children, Mad About You, and the Ricki Lake Show.
Lead roles in theatrical productions including Leonard Bernstein's "Mass, "​ Thornton Wilder's "The Matchmaker, "​ and Tennessee Williams'​ "Talk to Me Like the Rain and Let Me Listen."

Cindy Allen
Founder and CEO, Team Catalyst Holdings
April 7, 2010, Cindy worked with Libby Gill but at different companies

I had the privilege of hearing Libby speak at an executive forum and her message was refreshing, challenging and motivating.  She has a rare combination of executive level communication skills and on-the-ground execution skills. She poses the right questions to challenge others to think, the leadership ability to help them put it all together, and a high level of personal commitment and engagement to ensure understanding and satisfaction. Libby also has very strong listening skills - she works to absorb communication from her business partners to ensure she understands the goals and objectives at hand. Anyone, in any industry or organization, would have much to gain from working with Libby.

Libby Gill is one of the few outstanding people I am proud to know. I hired Libby in 2002 for some guidance in my career and personal life (I had taken a detour as caregiver and needed to get back to my life).  Her advice and practical steps were superb!  I had not met Libby in person until several years later when she was a guest speaker at my church in California.  She is personable, talented, possesses the highest integrity, and she is someone I would always be honored to have known, worked with, or call my friend or associate!

Esther Kiss
CEO at Kiss Media International Inc
October 18, 2016, Libby Gill worked with Esther in different groups

Having an extensive background in media and public relations, I know that publicity matters for coaches, consultants and authors. But it has to be the right kind of publicity. Esther Kiss understands that publicity has to move the needle on exposure, leads, and ultimately, sales to make a difference to your business. Esther has not only the media experience, but also the strategic and creative skills to help you get the outcome you desire. I highly recommend her services!

summary: After nearly twenty years in senior leadership Universal, Sony and Turner Broadcasting, Libby is now CEO of executive coaching and consulting firm Libby Gill & Company. An international speaker and bestselling author, she guides established and emerging leaders to inspire purpose and drive performance. Libby has shared her strategies as a leadership expert on CNN, NPR, the Today Show, and in BusinessWeek, Time, The New York Times, Wall Street Journal, and more.
